page.title: 13TEENAGER'S SAVINGS
page.content: When questioned about Economics 52% of teenagers used a{Bank,}41% used a {Building Society,}and 7% didn't use any. 80% of their money was in a Basic Ordinary Savings Account. When asked whether they were likely to use a bank or building society for their savings when they left school 64% said they would use a bank and 36% a building society. 40% said they would have a cheque book for withdrawals. Of the banks and building societies in Lutterworth, National Westminster was the only one that offered an account specially aimed at teenagers in the form of their 'On Line Account'. Banks in Lutterworth are National Westminster, Barclays and Trustees. There are 5 Building Societies in Lutterworth.
